title: Orbital Tri-face Watch Face
summary: Watch faces inspired by Space in three variants - Lunar, Stratos and Astro.
description: To select a watch face variant, long-press on the watch face, select the gear icon, and scroll and tap Lunar (moonlander mode), Stratos (space shuttle style) or Astro(naut attire).To configure watch face options, long-press, select the gear icon, and select "date on" or "date off" (to display the date) and "digital on" or "digital off" (to display digital time).Let's go to space!
descriptionHTML:
To select a watch face variant, long-press on the watch face, select the gear icon, and scroll and tap Lunar (moonlander mode), Stratos (space shuttle style) or Astro(naut attire).

To configure watch face options, long-press, select the gear icon, and select "date on" or "date off" (to display the date) and "digital on" or "digital off" (to display digital time).

Let's go to space!
comments: Well done app Please add 24h mode for the digital clock and a battery indicator in settings and it would be absolutely perfect.
